sources.title: Blake of Scotland Yard
sources.description: Sir James Blake has retired from Scotland Yard so that he can assist his niece Hope and her friend Jerry in developing an apparatus they have invented. Sir James thinks that their invention has the potential to prevent wars, and plans to donate it to the League of Nations. But a gang of criminals led by the elusive "Scorpion" steals the device, and Blake and his associates must recover the invention and determine the identity of the "Scorpion".

sources.title: Blake of Scotland Yard (1937) RALPH BYRD
sources.description:
Stars: Ralph Byrd, Herbert Rawlinson, Joan Barclay
Writer/Director: Robert F. Hill

A feature film length edition of the 15 episode serial in which Blake battles the "Scorpion" over possession of a 'death ray' machine.

sources.title: Blake of Scotland Yard (1937) Adventure, Crime, Sci-Fi Full Length Movie
sources.description:
Sir James Blake has retired from Scotland Yard so that he can assist his niece Hope, and her friend Jerry, in developing an apparatus they have invented, but he is called back onto the case after an experimental death ray is stolen.

Director: Robert F. Hill 
Writers: Robert F. Hill  (as Rock Hawley), Basil Dickey 
Stars: Ralph Byrd, Herbert Rawlinson, Joan Barclay
Genre: Adventure, Crime, Sci-Fi
